headline: Can AngloGold Ashanti's Investment in Geita Mine Improve Production?
summary: AU ramps up investment at its Geita mine, aiming to expand reserves, extend mine life and lift production through major upgrades.

headline: Where to Put Your Gold Money Now That The Market Is Getting Nervous
summary: Watch the Video When Lee asked me about the latest moves in gold, I told him the speed of the prior run still stood out. The metal sprinted toward the 4100 and 4200 range so quickly that many investors avoided buying simply because they felt they were chasing. Then the selling pressure hit. Gold dropped ... Where to Put Your Gold Money Now That The Market Is Getting Nervous
